channel.title: chip amp on Adam Piekarski
channel.description: Recent content in chip amp on Adam Piekarski

item.title: Dual mono LM3886 chip amp
item.description: My second endeavour into building an audio amplifier Round Two. Link to heading Background Link to heading After successfully building a LM3886 amplifier a couple of years ago, I decided it was time to build another one, be a bit ambitious with it and create something with a bit more oomfph. My previous attempt is still very capable, but is now starting to fall to bits because I didn’t own appropriate tools to produce a solid enclosure.
